Posts.Content: Jan 3, 2011 01:32PM Rebvig wrote: Nora I am right there with you. I just had my 3rd round of TCH and no period and awful night sweats.  I find if I take my quick acting anti anxiety medication just before I go to sleep I sleep longer.  I see my primary care doctor this week and I'm going to ask for something a little stronger to help me sleep.  Good Luck.
Posts.Title: No period and no sleep...TCH! nora_az Emme
